full_summary:
## Title
### Tender Notice: Support for Business Transformation Directorate
### RFP Documentation
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01004435
- **Tender Notice**: Issued on August 23, 2022
- **Closing Date**: September 6, 2022, at 14:00

### Tender Details
The Government of Canada invites you to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of professional services to support the Business Transformation Directorate at the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) and the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG).

### Description
The department requires the services of up to four (4) professional resources, which will form a team under the leadership of a Senior Business Analyst. These resources must be engaged on a Contract-Without and will be deployed under an irrevocable option that extends the contract term.

### Objectives
- To support the implementation of the Departmental Business Transformation plan
- To engage resources who meet the criteria outlined in the RFP

### Contract Period
The contract period will start from the contract award date and will last until March 31, 2023. There is an irrevocable option to extend the resulting contract term by up to two (2) additional one-year periods.

### Eligibility
To be eligible, prospective tenderers must be qualified teams with experience in business consulting, change management, and project management.

### Note
Access the full RFP document at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/23/6f3688c50762eca3345197112e9abae6/30003282_-_npp.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/23/37d2ce090b682ba2a1cbf57c9cf03a4f/30003282_-_apm.pdf (French)

### Contact Information
For inquiries, please contact:
- [Richard Soulliere](mailto:richard.soulliere@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)  - Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

---
